query.description: Query vars set by the user.

tax_query.description: Taxonomy query, as passed to get_tax_sql().

queried_object.description: Holds the data for a single object that is queried. Holds the contents of a post, page, category, attachment.

queried_object_id.description: The ID of the queried object.

posts.description: Array of post objects or post IDs.

post_count.description: The number of posts for the current query.

current_post.description: Index of the current item in the loop.

in_the_loop.description: Whether the loop has started and the caller is in the loop.

comments.description: The list of comments for current post.

comment_count.description: The number of comments for the posts.

current_comment.description: The index of the comment in the comment loop.

found_posts.description: The number of found posts for the current query. If limit clause was not used, equals $post_count.

is_single.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a single post.

is_preview.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a preview.

is_page.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a page.

is_archive.description: Signifies whether the current query is for an archive.

is_date.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a date archive.

is_year.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a year archive.

is_month.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a month archive.

is_day.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a day archive.

is_time.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a specific time.

is_author.description: Signifies whether the current query is for an author archive.

is_category.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a category archive.

is_tag.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a tag archive.

is_tax.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a taxonomy archive.

is_search.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a search.

is_feed.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a feed.

is_comment_feed.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a comment feed.

is_trackback.description: Signifies whether the current query is for trackback endpoint call.

is_home.description: Signifies whether the current query is for the site homepage.

is_privacy_policy.description: Signifies whether the current query is for the Privacy Policy page.

is_404.description: Signifies whether the current query couldn't find anything.

is_embed.description: Signifies whether the current query is for an embed.

is_paged.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a paged result and not for the first page.

is_admin.description: Signifies whether the current query is for an administrative interface page.

is_attachment.description: Signifies whether the current query is for an attachment page.

is_singular.description: Signifies whether the current query is for an existing single post of any post type (post, attachment, page, custom post types).

is_robots.description: Signifies whether the current query is for the robots.txt file.

is_favicon.description: Signifies whether the current query is for the favicon.ico file.

is_posts_page.description: Signifies whether the current query is for the page_for_posts page. Basically, the homepage if the option isn't set for the static homepage.

is_post_type_archive.description: Signifies whether the current query is for a post type archive.

thumbnails_cached.description: Set if post thumbnails are cached
